definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
(of a team) to throw oneself into the battle

sentences.english: He devoted all his life to the cause of military aviation.
sentences.chinese: 他把一生都献给了军用航空事业。

sentences.english: All the military aircraft are required to achieve higher cost-effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 对于现代的军用飞机，都要求它们具有高的效费比。

sentences.english: And Marchisio similar can be said of today's armed forces Yongming Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 与马尔基西奥类似，今天的尤文图斯可谓三军用命。

sentences.english: An abandoned military road, overgrown with weeds, marked the former boundary line.
sentences.chinese: 一条长满野草的废弃军用公路标示出以前的边界线。

sentences.english: Residents Liu used cell phone cameras to the video of the construction site at night.
sentences.chinese: 居民刘军用手机拍摄到了工地夜间施工的视频。

sentences.english: They say he used a military-style assault rifle to carry out the shooting spree.
sentences.chinese: 他们称，他使用一支军用突击步枪实施了此次枪击案。

sentences.english: Militants also attacked the US military's main airport in Afghanistan with rockets.
sentences.chinese: 武装分子还使用火箭袭击了美军的主要军用机场。

sentences.english: Sales of the Aerospace Division are both commercial and defense-related.
sentences.chinese: 航空部门的销售额包括军用和商用两个方面。

sentences.english: Then military helicopters will be sent to Cairo, Mubarak Police Academy for trial.
sentences.chinese: 随后军用直升机将把穆巴拉克送至开罗警官学院受审。

sentences.english: Pinchgut is now a museum for cannon and antique mat è riel.
sentences.chinese: 品奇各特现在是大炮和旧时军用装备博物馆。

sentences.english: Unlike many, however, Curie felt her place was in Paris. After the radium was in a Bordeaux safe-deposit box, she returned to Paris on a military train.
sentences.chinese: 在镭安全抵达波多尔市后，她乘军用火车回到了巴黎。

sentences.english: Mary Motta and Mil Arcega contributed to this report.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽莫塔和军用Arcega促成了这一报告。

sentences.english: This is a mixed civilian-military airport.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个混合民用军用机场。

sentences.english: With a good coach like Larry Brown, he can bring them back together.
sentences.chinese: 布朗是个好教练，他可以使球员做到三军用命。

sentences.english: The plant did not process weapon-grade uranium till 1987.
sentences.chinese: 到1987年，该厂就不再生产军用浓缩铀了。

sentences.english: All these tanks and other military vehicles really impress.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些坦克和其他军用车都令人印象深刻。

definition: standardized/standard (service, method etc)/regulation (clothing etc)/formulaic/(telecommunications etc) system/format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)
